Reviews.Title: OK but not very clear - not worth the money
Reviews.Author: AEinstein
Reviews.Content: I purchased this QD6002D hoping I would get a clear camera with a reasonably close image.The camera has disappointed me in almost every way.To begin with in order to ZOOM or FOCUS the camera you have adjust a screw on the camera.  Or to set the camera up you have to push a BUTTON located on the input cable about ONE FOOT from the camera.Now imagine this.... you have the camera mounted in the location you prefer, then you have to somehow connect a display -within reach of the camera- so you can FOCUS or change the SETTINGS!!!!  Try that while on a ladder!After doing a balancing act and getting it set up I found the CLARITY of the image to be POOR.  I climbed the ladder more than once to try and correct the unclear image.  I even attached another camera to the same connection to verify that it was good.The original cameras that came with the system have a sharper image.Don't waste your time or money expecting a better camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
600TVL of Resolution
Ultra high defintion video
Manually adjustable 2.8mm to 12mm varifocal lens and focus
State-of-the-art IR cut filter
On Screen Display (Built In)
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QD6002D-N Elite Dome Color Camera with 600TVL and 70ft of Night Vision
